2259 void CSolver::Gauss_Elimination(su2double** A, su2double* rhs, unsigned short nVar) {
2260 
2261  short iVar, jVar, kVar;
2262  su2double weight, aux;
2263 
2264  if (nVar == 1)
2265  rhs[0] /= A[0][0];
2266  else {
2267 
2268  /*--- Transform system in Upper Matrix ---*/
2269 
2270  for (iVar = 1; iVar < (short)nVar; iVar++) {
2271  for (jVar = 0; jVar < iVar; jVar++) {
2272  weight = A[iVar][jVar]/A[jVar][jVar];
2273  for (kVar = jVar; kVar < (short)nVar; kVar++)
2274  A[iVar][kVar] -= weight*A[jVar][kVar];
2275  rhs[iVar] -= weight*rhs[jVar];
2276  }
2277  }
2278 
2279  /*--- Backwards substitution ---*/
2280 
2281  rhs[nVar-1] = rhs[nVar-1]/A[nVar-1][nVar-1];
2282  for (iVar = (short)nVar-2; iVar >= 0; iVar--) {
2283  aux = 0;
2284  for (jVar = iVar+1; jVar < (short)nVar; jVar++)
2285  aux += A[iVar][jVar]*rhs[jVar];
2286  rhs[iVar] = (rhs[iVar]-aux)/A[iVar][iVar];
2287  if (iVar == 0) break;
2288  }
2289  }
2290 
2291 }
2292 
2293 void CSolver::Aeroelastic(CSurfaceMovement *surface_movement, CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, unsigned long TimeIter) {
2294 
2295  /*--- Variables used for Aeroelastic case ---*/
2296 
2297  su2double Cl, Cd, Cn, Ct, Cm, Cn_rot;
2298  su2double Alpha = config->GetAoA()*PI_NUMBER/180.0;
2299  vector<su2double> structural_solution(4,0.0); //contains solution(displacements and rates) of typical section wing model.
2300 
2301  unsigned short iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, Monitoring;
2302  string Marker_Tag, Monitoring_Tag;
2303 
2304  /*--- Loop over markers and find the ones being monitored. ---*/
2305 
2306  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
2307  Monitoring = config->GetMarker_All_Monitoring(iMarker);
2308  if (Monitoring == YES) {
2309 
2310  /*--- Find the particular marker being monitored and get the forces acting on it. ---*/
2311 
2312  for (iMarker_Monitoring = 0; iMarker_Monitoring < config->GetnMarker_Monitoring(); iMarker_Monitoring++) {
2313  Monitoring_Tag = config->GetMarker_Monitoring_TagBound(iMarker_Monitoring);
2314  Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
2315  if (Marker_Tag == Monitoring_Tag) {
2316 
2317  Cl = GetSurface_CL(iMarker_Monitoring);
2318  Cd = GetSurface_CD(iMarker_Monitoring);
2319 
2320  /*--- For typical section wing model want the force normal to the airfoil (in the direction of the spring) ---*/
2321  Cn = Cl*cos(Alpha) + Cd*sin(Alpha);
2322  Ct = -Cl*sin(Alpha) + Cd*cos(Alpha);
2323 
2324  Cm = GetSurface_CMz(iMarker_Monitoring);
2325 
2326  /*--- Calculate forces for the Typical Section Wing Model taking into account rotation ---*/
2327 
2328  /*--- Note that the calculation of the forces and the subsequent displacements ...
2329  is only correct for the airfoil that starts at the 0 degree position ---*/
2330 
2331  if (config->GetKind_GridMovement() == AEROELASTIC_RIGID_MOTION) {
2332  su2double Omega, dt, psi;
2333  dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2334  Omega = (config->GetRotation_Rate(2)/config->GetOmega_Ref());
2335  psi = Omega*(dt*TimeIter);
2336 
2337  /*--- Correct for the airfoil starting position (This is hardcoded in here) ---*/
2338  if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil1") {
2339  psi = psi + 0.0;
2340  }
2341  else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil2") {
2342  psi = psi + 2.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
2343  }
2344  else if (Monitoring_Tag == "Airfoil3") {
2345  psi = psi + 4.0/3.0*PI_NUMBER;
2346  }
2347  else
2348  cout << "WARNING: There is a marker that we are monitoring that doesn't match the values hardcoded above!" << endl;
2349 
2350  cout << Monitoring_Tag << " position " << psi*180.0/PI_NUMBER << " degrees. " << endl;
2351 
2352  Cn_rot = Cn*cos(psi) - Ct*sin(psi); //Note the signs are different for accounting for the AOA.
2353  Cn = Cn_rot;
2354  }
2355 
2356  /*--- Solve the aeroelastic equations for the particular marker(surface) ---*/
2357 
2358  SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(geometry, Cn, Cm, config, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
2359 
2360  break;
2361  }
2362  }
2363 
2364  /*--- Compute the new surface node locations ---*/
2365  surface_movement->AeroelasticDeform(geometry, config, TimeIter, iMarker, iMarker_Monitoring, structural_solution);
2366 
2367  }
2368 
2369  }
2370 
2371 }
2372 
2373 void CSolver::SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(vector<vector<su2double> >& Phi, vector<su2double>& omega, CConfig *config) {
2374 
2375  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2376  su2double w_h = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Plunge();
2377  su2double w_a = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
2378  su2double x_a = config->GetAeroelastic_CG_Location();
2379  su2double r_a = sqrt(config->GetAeroelastic_Radius_Gyration_Squared());
2380  su2double w = w_h/w_a;
2381 
2382  // Mass Matrix
2383  vector<vector<su2double> > M(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2384  M[0][0] = 1;
2385  M[0][1] = x_a;
2386  M[1][0] = x_a;
2387  M[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
2388 
2389  // Stiffness Matrix
2390  // vector<vector<su2double> > K(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2391  // K[0][0] = (w_h/w_a)*(w_h/w_a);
2392  // K[0][1] = 0.0;
2393  // K[1][0] = 0.0;
2394  // K[1][1] = r_a*r_a;
2395 
2396  /* Eigenvector and Eigenvalue Matrices of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. */
2397 
2398  vector<vector<su2double> > Omega2(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2399  su2double aux; // auxiliary variable
2400  aux = sqrt(pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,4) - 2*pow(r_a,2)*pow(w,2) + pow(r_a,2) + 4*pow(x_a,2)*pow(w,2));
2401  Phi[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
2402  Phi[0][1] = (r_a * (r_a - r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*x_a*pow(w, 2));
2403  Phi[1][0] = 1.0;
2404  Phi[1][1] = 1.0;
2405 
2406  Omega2[0][0] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) - aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
2407  Omega2[0][1] = 0;
2408  Omega2[1][0] = 0;
2409  Omega2[1][1] = (r_a * (r_a + r_a*pow(w,2) + aux)) / (2*(pow(r_a, 2) - pow(x_a, 2)));
2410 
2411  /* Nondimesionalize the Eigenvectors such that Phi'*M*Phi = I and PHI'*K*PHI = Omega */
2412  // Phi'*M*Phi = D
2413  // D^(-1/2)*Phi'*M*Phi*D^(-1/2) = D^(-1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(1/2)*D^(-1/2) = I, D^(-1/2) = inv(sqrt(D))
2414  // Phi = Phi*D^(-1/2)
2415 
2416  vector<vector<su2double> > Aux(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2417  vector<vector<su2double> > D(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2418  // Aux = M*Phi
2419  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2420  for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
2421  Aux[i][j] = 0;
2422  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2423  Aux[i][j] += M[i][k]*Phi[k][j];
2424  }
2425  }
2426  }
2427 
2428  // D = Phi'*Aux
2429  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2430  for (int j=0; j<2; j++) {
2431  D[i][j] = 0;
2432  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2433  D[i][j] += Phi[k][i]*Aux[k][j]; //PHI transpose
2434  }
2435  }
2436  }
2437 
2438  //Modify the first column
2439  Phi[0][0] = Phi[0][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
2440  Phi[1][0] = Phi[1][0] * 1/sqrt(D[0][0]);
2441  //Modify the second column
2442  Phi[0][1] = Phi[0][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
2443  Phi[1][1] = Phi[1][1] * 1/sqrt(D[1][1]);
2444 
2445  // Sqrt of the eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes)
2446  omega[0] = sqrt(Omega2[0][0]);
2447  omega[1] = sqrt(Omega2[1][1]);
2448 
2449 }
2450 
2451 void CSolver::SolveTypicalSectionWingModel(CGeometry *geometry, su2double Cl, su2double Cm, CConfig *config, unsigned short iMarker, vector<su2double>& displacements) {
2452 
2453  /*--- The aeroelastic model solved in this routine is the typical section wing model
2454  The details of the implementation are similar to those found in J.J. Alonso
2455  "Fully-Implicit Time-Marching Aeroelastic Solutions" 1994. ---*/
2456 
2457  /*--- Retrieve values from the config file ---*/
2458  su2double w_alpha = config->GetAeroelastic_Frequency_Pitch();
2459  su2double vf = config->GetAeroelastic_Flutter_Speed_Index();
2460  su2double b = config->GetLength_Reynolds()/2.0; // airfoil semichord, Reynolds length is by defaul 1.0
2461  su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTimeND();
2462  dt = dt*w_alpha; //Non-dimensionalize the structural time.
2463 
2464  /*--- Structural Equation damping ---*/
2465  vector<su2double> xi(2,0.0);
2466 
2467  /*--- Eigenvectors and Eigenvalues of the Generalized EigenValue Problem. ---*/
2468  vector<vector<su2double> > Phi(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0)); // generalized eigenvectors.
2469  vector<su2double> w(2,0.0); // sqrt of the generalized eigenvalues (frequency of vibration of the modes).
2470  SetUpTypicalSectionWingModel(Phi, w, config);
2471 
2472  /*--- Solving the Decoupled Aeroelastic Problem with second order time discretization Eq (9) ---*/
2473 
2474  /*--- Solution variables description. //x[j][i], j-entry, i-equation. // Time (n+1)->np1, n->n, (n-1)->n1 ---*/
2475  vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2476 
2477  /*--- Values from previous movement of spring at true time step n+1
2478  We use this values because we are solving for delta changes not absolute changes ---*/
2479  vector<vector<su2double> > x_np1_old = config->GetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker);
2480 
2481  /*--- Values at previous timesteps. ---*/
2482  vector<vector<su2double> > x_n = config->GetAeroelastic_n(iMarker);
2483  vector<vector<su2double> > x_n1 = config->GetAeroelastic_n1(iMarker);
2484 
2485  /*--- Set up of variables used to solve the structural problem. ---*/
2486  vector<su2double> f_tilde(2,0.0);
2487  vector<vector<su2double> > A_inv(2,vector<su2double>(2,0.0));
2488  su2double detA;
2489  su2double s1, s2;
2490  vector<su2double> rhs(2,0.0); //right hand side
2491  vector<su2double> eta(2,0.0);
2492  vector<su2double> eta_dot(2,0.0);
2493 
2494  /*--- Forcing Term ---*/
2495  su2double cons = vf*vf/PI_NUMBER;
2496  vector<su2double> f(2,0.0);
2497  f[0] = cons*(-Cl);
2498  f[1] = cons*(2*-Cm);
2499 
2500  //f_tilde = Phi'*f
2501  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2502  f_tilde[i] = 0;
2503  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2504  f_tilde[i] += Phi[k][i]*f[k]; //PHI transpose
2505  }
2506  }
2507 
2508  /*--- solve each decoupled equation (The inverse of the 2x2 matrix is provided) ---*/
2509  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2510  /* Matrix Inverse */
2511  detA = 9.0/(4.0*dt*dt) + 3*w[i]*xi[i]/(dt) + w[i]*w[i];
2512  A_inv[0][0] = 1/detA * (3/(2.0*dt) + 2*xi[i]*w[i]);
2513  A_inv[0][1] = 1/detA * 1;
2514  A_inv[1][0] = 1/detA * -w[i]*w[i];
2515  A_inv[1][1] = 1/detA * 3/(2.0*dt);
2516 
2517  /* Source Terms from previous iterations */
2518  s1 = (-4*x_n[0][i] + x_n1[0][i])/(2.0*dt);
2519  s2 = (-4*x_n[1][i] + x_n1[1][i])/(2.0*dt);
2520 
2521  /* Problem Right Hand Side */
2522  rhs[0] = -s1;
2523  rhs[1] = f_tilde[i]-s2;
2524 
2525  /* Solve the equations */
2526  x_np1[0][i] = A_inv[0][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[0][1]*rhs[1];
2527  x_np1[1][i] = A_inv[1][0]*rhs[0] + A_inv[1][1]*rhs[1];
2528 
2529  eta[i] = x_np1[0][i]-x_np1_old[0][i]; // For displacements, the change(deltas) is used.
2530  eta_dot[i] = x_np1[1][i]; // For velocities, absolute values are used.
2531  }
2532 
2533  /*--- Transform back from the generalized coordinates to get the actual displacements in plunge and pitch q = Phi*eta ---*/
2534  vector<su2double> q(2,0.0);
2535  vector<su2double> q_dot(2,0.0);
2536  for (int i=0; i<2; i++) {
2537  q[i] = 0;
2538  q_dot[i] = 0;
2539  for (int k=0; k<2; k++) {
2540  q[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta[k];
2541  q_dot[i] += Phi[i][k]*eta_dot[k];
2542  }
2543  }
2544 
2545  su2double dh = b*q[0];
2546  su2double dalpha = q[1];
2547 
2548  su2double h_dot = w_alpha*b*q_dot[0]; //The w_a brings it back to actual time.
2549  su2double alpha_dot = w_alpha*q_dot[1];
2550 
2551  /*--- Set the solution of the structural equations ---*/
2552  displacements[0] = dh;
2553  displacements[1] = dalpha;
2554  displacements[2] = h_dot;
2555  displacements[3] = alpha_dot;
2556 
2557  /*--- Calculate the total plunge and total pitch displacements for the unsteady step by summing the displacement at each sudo time step ---*/
2558  su2double pitch, plunge;
2559  pitch = config->GetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker);
2560  plunge = config->GetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker);
2561 
2562  config->SetAeroelastic_pitch(iMarker , pitch+dalpha);
2563  config->SetAeroelastic_plunge(iMarker , plunge+dh/b);
2564 
2565  /*--- Set the Aeroelastic solution at time n+1. This gets update every sudo time step
2566  and after convering the sudo time step the solution at n+1 get moved to the solution at n
2567  in SetDualTime_Solver method ---*/
2568 
2569  config->SetAeroelastic_np1(iMarker, x_np1);
2570 
2571 }
2572

2574 
2575  BEGIN_SU2_OMP_SAFE_GLOBAL_ACCESS {

2592

2594 
2595  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

2627 
2628  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2629

2631  Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);

2634  }

2636

2638  }
2639  }
2640 
2641  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
2642 
2643  if (iPoint_Global_Local < geometry->GetnPointDomain()) {
2644  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
2645  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2646  }
2647 
2648  /*--- Close the restart file ---*/
2649 
2650  restart_file_n.close();
2651 
2652  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2653  /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
2654

2656 
2657  if (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_2ND) {
2658

2660  string filename_n1;
2661 
2662  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
2663  if (config->GetRestart()) Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetRestart_Iter())-2;
2664  else Unst_RestartIter = SU2_TYPE::Int(config->GetUnst_AdjointIter())-2;
2665  filename_n1 = config->GetFilename(filename, ".csv", Unst_RestartIter);
2666

2671  SU2_MPI::Error(string("There is no flow restart file ") + filename_n1, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2672 
2673  }
2674

2676  iPoint_Global_Local = 0; iPoint_Global = 0;
2677 
2678  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file ---*/
2679  /*--- The first line is the header ---*/
2680 
2681  getline (restart_file_n1, text_line);
2682 
2683  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
2684

2686 
2687  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, ',');
2688 
2689  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2690  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2691 
2692  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2693 
2694  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2695 
2696  Coord[0] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[1]);
2697  Coord[1] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[2]);
2698  if (nDim == 3){
2699  Coord[2] = PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[3]);
2700  }
2701

2703

2705  }
2706

2710

2720  }

2722  }

2725  /*--- It's necessary to communicate this information ---*/

2732 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
2733 
2734  ifstream restart_file;
2735  string text_line, Tag;
2736  unsigned short iVar;
2737  long iPoint_Local = 0; unsigned long iPoint_Global = 0;
2738  int counter = 0;
2739  fields.clear();
2740 
2741  Restart_Vars = new int[5];
2742 
2743  string error_string = "Note: ASCII restart files must be in CSV format since v7.0.\n"
2744  "Check https://su2code.github.io/docs/Guide-to-v7 for more information.";
2745 
2746  /*--- First, check that this is not a binary restart file. ---*/
2747 
2748  char fname[100];
2749  val_filename += ".csv";
2750  strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
2751  int magic_number;
2752 
2753 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
2754 
2755  /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
2756 
2757  FILE *fhw;
2758  fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
2759  size_t ret;
2760 
2761  /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
2762 
2763  if (!fhw) {
2764  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + fname, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2765  }
2766 
2767  /*--- Attempt to read the first int, which should be our magic number. ---*/
2768 
2769  ret = fread(&magic_number, sizeof(int), 1, fhw);
2770  if (ret != 1) {
2771  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2772  }
2773 
2774  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2775  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2776 
2777  if (magic_number == 535532) {
2778  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
2779  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2780  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2781  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2782  }
2783 
2784  fclose(fhw);
2785 
2786 #else
2787 
2788  /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
2789 
2790  MPI_File fhw;
2791  int ierr;
2792 
2793  /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
2794 
2795  ierr = MPI_File_open(SU2_MPI::GetComm(), fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
2796 
2797  /*--- Error check opening the file. ---*/
2798 
2799  if (ierr) {
2800  SU2_MPI::Error(string("SU2 ASCII restart file ") + string(fname) + string(" not found.\n") + error_string,
2801  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2802  }
2803 
2804  /*--- Have the master attempt to read the magic number. ---*/
2805 
2806  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
2807  MPI_File_read(fhw, &magic_number, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2808 
2809  /*--- Broadcast the number of variables to all procs and store clearly. ---*/
2810 
2811  SU2_MPI::Bcast(&magic_number, 1, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2812 
2813  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2814  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2815 
2816  if (magic_number == 535532) {
2817  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is a binary SU2 restart file, expected ASCII.\n") +
2818  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2819  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2820  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2821  }
2822 
2823  MPI_File_close(&fhw);
2824 
2825 #endif
2826 
2827  /*--- Open the restart file ---*/
2828 
2829  restart_file.open(val_filename.data(), ios::in);
2830 
2831  /*--- In case there is no restart file ---*/
2832 
2833  if (restart_file.fail()) {
2834  SU2_MPI::Error(string("SU2 ASCII restart file ") + string(fname) + string(" not found.\n") + error_string,
2835  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2836  }
2837 
2838  /*--- Identify the number of fields (and names) in the restart file ---*/
2839 
2840  getline (restart_file, text_line);
2841 
2842  char delimiter = ',';
2843  fields = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, delimiter);
2844 
2845  if (fields.size() <= 1) {
2846  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Restart file does not seem to be a CSV file.\n") + error_string, CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2847  }
2848 
2849  for (unsigned short iField = 0; iField < fields.size(); iField++){
2850  PrintingToolbox::trim(fields[iField]);
2851  }
2852 
2853  /*--- Set the number of variables, one per field in the
2854  restart file (without including the PointID) ---*/
2855 
2856  Restart_Vars[1] = (int)fields.size() - 1;
2857 
2858  /*--- Allocate memory for the restart data. ---*/
2859 
2860  Restart_Data = new passivedouble[Restart_Vars[1]*geometry->GetnPointDomain()];
2861 
2862  /*--- Read all lines in the restart file and extract data. ---*/
2863 
2864  for (iPoint_Global = 0; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++) {
2865 
2866  if (!getline (restart_file, text_line)) break;
2867 
2868  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
2869  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
2870 
2871  iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
2872 
2873  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
2874 
2875  vector<string> point_line = PrintingToolbox::split(text_line, delimiter);
2876 
2877  /*--- Store the solution (starting with node coordinates) --*/
2878 
2879  for (iVar = 0; iVar < Restart_Vars[1]; iVar++)
2880  Restart_Data[counter*Restart_Vars[1] + iVar] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(PrintingToolbox::stod(point_line[iVar+1]));
2881 
2882  /*--- Increment our local point counter. ---*/
2883 
2884  counter++;
2885 
2886  }
2887  }
2888 
2889  if (iPoint_Global != geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain())
2890  SU2_MPI::Error("The solution file does not match the mesh, currently only binary files can be interpolated.",
2891  CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2892 
2893 }

2895 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, string val_filename) {
2896 
2897  char str_buf[CGNS_STRING_SIZE], fname[100];
2898  val_filename += ".dat";
2899  strcpy(fname, val_filename.c_str());
2900  const int nRestart_Vars = 5;
2901  Restart_Vars = new int[nRestart_Vars];
2902  fields.clear();
2903 
2904 #ifndef HAVE_MPI
2905 
2906  /*--- Serial binary input. ---*/
2907 
2908  FILE *fhw;
2909  fhw = fopen(fname,"rb");
2910  size_t ret;
2911 
2912  /*--- Error check for opening the file. ---*/
2913 
2914  if (!fhw) {
2915  SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + string(fname), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2916  }
2917 
2918  /*--- First, read the number of variables and points. ---*/
2919 
2920  ret = fread(Restart_Vars, sizeof(int), nRestart_Vars, fhw);
2921  if (ret != (unsigned long)nRestart_Vars) {
2922  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2923  }
2924 
2925  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2926  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2927 
2928  if (Restart_Vars[0] != 535532) {
2929  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is not a binary SU2 restart file.\n") +
2930  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
2931  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
2932  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2933  }
2934 
2935  /*--- Store the number of fields and points to be read for clarity. ---*/
2936 
2937  const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
2938  const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
2939 
2940  /*--- Read the variable names from the file. Note that we are adopting a
2941  fixed length of 33 for the string length to match with CGNS. This is
2942  needed for when we read the strings later. We pad the beginning of the
2943  variable string vector with the Point_ID tag that wasn't written. ---*/
2944 
2945  fields.push_back("Point_ID");
2946  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nFields; iVar++) {
2947  ret = fread(str_buf, sizeof(char), CGNS_STRING_SIZE, fhw);
2948  if (ret != (unsigned long)CGNS_STRING_SIZE) {
2949  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2950  }
2951  fields.push_back(str_buf);
2952  }
2953 
2954  /*--- For now, create a temp 1D buffer to read the data from file. ---*/
2955 
2956  Restart_Data = new passivedouble[nFields*nPointFile];
2957 
2958  /*--- Read in the data for the restart at all local points. ---*/
2959 
2960  ret = fread(Restart_Data, sizeof(passivedouble), nFields*nPointFile, fhw);
2961  if (ret != nFields*nPointFile) {
2962  SU2_MPI::Error("Error reading restart file.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2963  }
2964 
2965  /*--- Close the file. ---*/
2966 
2967  fclose(fhw);
2968 
2969 #else
2970 
2971  /*--- Parallel binary input using MPI I/O. ---*/
2972 
2973  MPI_File fhw;
2974  SU2_MPI::Status status;
2975  MPI_Datatype etype, filetype;
2976  MPI_Offset disp;
2977 
2978  /*--- All ranks open the file using MPI. ---*/
2979 
2980  int ierr = MPI_File_open(SU2_MPI::GetComm(), fname, MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_INFO_NULL, &fhw);
2981 
2982  if (ierr) SU2_MPI::Error(string("Unable to open SU2 restart file ") + string(fname), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
2983 
2984  /*--- First, read the number of variables and points (i.e., cols and rows),
2985  which we will need in order to read the file later. Also, read the
2986  variable string names here. Only the master rank reads the header. ---*/
2987 
2988  if (rank == MASTER_NODE)
2989  MPI_File_read(fhw, Restart_Vars, nRestart_Vars, MPI_INT, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
2990 
2991  /*--- Broadcast the number of variables to all procs and store clearly. ---*/
2992 
2993  SU2_MPI::Bcast(Restart_Vars, nRestart_Vars, MPI_INT, MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
2994 
2995  /*--- Check that this is an SU2 binary file. SU2 binary files
2996  have the hex representation of "SU2" as the first int in the file. ---*/
2997 
2998  if (Restart_Vars[0] != 535532) {
2999  SU2_MPI::Error(string("File ") + string(fname) + string(" is not a binary SU2 restart file.\n") +
3000  string("SU2 reads/writes binary restart files by default.\n") +
3001  string("Note that backward compatibility for ASCII restart files is\n") +
3002  string("possible with the READ_BINARY_RESTART option."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3003  }
3004 
3005  /*--- Store the number of fields and points to be read for clarity. ---*/
3006 
3007  const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
3008  const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
3009 
3010  /*--- Read the variable names from the file. Note that we are adopting a
3011  fixed length of 33 for the string length to match with CGNS. This is
3012  needed for when we read the strings later. ---*/
3013 
3014  char *mpi_str_buf = new char[nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE];
3015  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3016  disp = nRestart_Vars*sizeof(int);
3017  MPI_File_read_at(fhw, disp, mpi_str_buf, nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE,
3018  MPI_CHAR, MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3019  }
3020 
3021  /*--- Broadcast the string names of the variables. ---*/
3022 
3023  SU2_MPI::Bcast(mpi_str_buf, nFields*CGNS_STRING_SIZE, MPI_CHAR,
3024  MASTER_NODE, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3025 
3026  /*--- Now parse the string names and load into the config class in case
3027  we need them for writing visualization files (SU2_SOL). ---*/
3028 
3029  fields.push_back("Point_ID");
3030  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nFields; iVar++) {
3031  const auto index = iVar*CGNS_STRING_SIZE;
3032  string field_buf("\"");
3033  for (int iChar = 0; iChar < CGNS_STRING_SIZE; iChar++) {
3034  str_buf[iChar] = mpi_str_buf[index + iChar];
3035  }
3036  field_buf.append(str_buf);
3037  field_buf.append("\"");
3038  fields.push_back(field_buf.c_str());
3039  }
3040 
3041  /*--- Free string buffer memory. ---*/
3042 
3043  delete [] mpi_str_buf;
3044 
3045  /*--- We're writing only su2doubles in the data portion of the file. ---*/
3046 
3047  etype = MPI_DOUBLE;
3048 
3049  /*--- We need to ignore the 4 ints describing the nVar_Restart and nPoints,
3050  along with the string names of the variables. ---*/
3051 
3052  disp = nRestart_Vars*sizeof(int) + CGNS_STRING_SIZE*nFields*sizeof(char);
3053 
3054  /*--- Define a derived datatype for this rank's set of non-contiguous data
3055  that will be placed in the restart. Here, we are collecting each one of the
3056  points which are distributed throughout the file in blocks of nVar_Restart data. ---*/
3057 
3058  int nBlock;
3059  int *blocklen = nullptr;
3060  MPI_Aint *displace = nullptr;
3061 
3062  if (nPointFile == geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() ||
3063  config->GetKind_SU2() == SU2_COMPONENT::SU2_SOL) {
3064  /*--- No interpolation, each rank reads the indices it needs. ---*/
3065  nBlock = geometry->GetnPointDomain();
3066 
3067  blocklen = new int[nBlock];
3068  displace = new MPI_Aint[nBlock];
3069  int counter = 0;
3070  for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); ++iPoint_Global) {
3071  if (geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global) > -1) {
3072  blocklen[counter] = nFields;
3073  displace[counter] = iPoint_Global*nFields*sizeof(passivedouble);
3074  counter++;
3075  }
3076  }
3077  }
3078  else {
3079  /*--- Interpolation required, read large blocks of data. ---*/
3080  nBlock = 1;
3081 
3082  blocklen = new int[nBlock];
3083  displace = new MPI_Aint[nBlock];
3084 
3085  const auto partitioner = CLinearPartitioner(nPointFile,0);
3086 
3087  blocklen[0] = nFields*partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank);
3088  displace[0] = nFields*partitioner.GetFirstIndexOnRank(rank)*sizeof(passivedouble);;
3089  }
3090 
3091  MPI_Type_create_hindexed(nBlock, blocklen, displace, MPI_DOUBLE, &filetype);
3092  MPI_Type_commit(&filetype);
3093 
3094  /*--- Set the view for the MPI file write, i.e., describe the location in
3095  the file that this rank "sees" for writing its piece of the restart file. ---*/
3096 
3097  MPI_File_set_view(fhw, disp, etype, filetype, (char*)"native", MPI_INFO_NULL);
3098 
3099  /*--- For now, create a temp 1D buffer to read the data from file. ---*/
3100 
3101  const int bufSize = nBlock*blocklen[0];
3102  Restart_Data = new passivedouble[bufSize];
3103 
3104  /*--- Collective call for all ranks to read from their view simultaneously. ---*/
3105 
3106  MPI_File_read_all(fhw, Restart_Data, bufSize, MPI_DOUBLE, &status);
3107 
3108  /*--- All ranks close the file after writing. ---*/
3109 
3110  MPI_File_close(&fhw);
3111 
3112  /*--- Free the derived datatype and release temp memory. ---*/
3113 
3114  MPI_Type_free(&filetype);
3115 
3116  delete [] blocklen;
3117  delete [] displace;
3118 
3119 #endif
3120 
3121  if (nPointFile != geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() &&
3122  config->GetKind_SU2() != SU2_COMPONENT::SU2_SOL) {
3123  InterpolateRestartData(geometry, config);
3124  }
3125 }
3126 
3127 void CSolver::InterpolateRestartData(const CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config) {
3128 
3129  if (geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() == 0) return;
3130 
3131  if (size != SINGLE_NODE && size % 2)
3132  SU2_MPI::Error("Number of ranks must be multiple of 2.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3133 
3134  if (config->GetFEMSolver())
3135  SU2_MPI::Error("Cannot interpolate the restart file for FEM problems.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3136 
3137  /* Challenges:
3138  * - Do not use too much memory by gathering the restart data in all ranks.
3139  * - Do not repeat too many computations in all ranks.
3140  * Solution?:
3141  * - Build a local ADT for the domain points (not the restart points).
3142  * - Find the closest target point for each donor, which does not match all targets.
3143  * - "Diffuse" the data to neighbor points.
3144  * Complexity is approx. Nlt + (Nlt + Nd) log(Nlt) where Nlt is the LOCAL number
3145  * of target points and Nd the TOTAL number of donors. */
3146 
3147  const unsigned long nFields = Restart_Vars[1];
3148  const unsigned long nPointFile = Restart_Vars[2];
3149  const auto t0 = SU2_MPI::Wtime();
3150  auto nRecurse = 0;
3151 
3152  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3153  cout << "\nThe number of points in the restart file (" << nPointFile << ") does not match "
3154  "the mesh (" << geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain() << ").\n"
3155  "A recursive nearest neighbor interpolation will be performed." << endl;
3156  }
3157 
3158  su2activematrix localVars(nPointDomain, nFields);
3159  localVars = su2double(0.0);
3160  {
3161  su2vector<uint8_t> isMapped(nPoint);
3162  isMapped = false;
3163 
3164  /*--- ADT of local target points. ---*/
3165  {
3166  const auto& coord = geometry->nodes->GetCoord();
3167  vector<unsigned long> index(nPointDomain);
3168  iota(index.begin(), index.end(), 0ul);
3169 
3170  CADTPointsOnlyClass adt(nDim, nPointDomain, coord.data(), index.data(), false);
3171  vector<unsigned long>().swap(index);
3172 
3173  /*--- Copy local donor restart data, which will circulate over all ranks. ---*/
3174 
3175  const auto partitioner = CLinearPartitioner(nPointFile,0);
3176 
3177  unsigned long nPointDonorMax = 0;
3178  for (int i=0; i<size; ++i)
3179  nPointDonorMax = max(nPointDonorMax, partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(i));
3180 
3181  su2activematrix sendBuf(nPointDonorMax, nFields);
3182 
3183  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDonorMax; ++iPoint) {
3184  const auto iPointDonor = min(iPoint,partitioner.GetSizeOnRank(rank)-1ul);
3185  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nFields; ++iVar)
3186  sendBuf(iPoint,iVar) = Restart_Data[iPointDonor*nFields+iVar];
3187  }
3188 
3189  delete [] Restart_Data;
3190  Restart_Data = nullptr;
3191 
3192  /*--- Make room to receive donor data from other ranks, and to map it to target points. ---*/
3193 
3194  su2activematrix donorVars(nPointDonorMax, nFields);
3195  vector<su2double> donorDist(nPointDomain, 1e12);
3196 
3197  /*--- Circle over all ranks. ---*/
3198 
3199  const int dst = (rank+1) % size; // send to next
3200  const int src = (rank-1+size) % size; // receive from prev.
3201  const int count = sendBuf.size();
3202 
3203  for (int iStep = 0; iStep < size; ++iStep) {
3204 
3205  swap(sendBuf, donorVars);
3206 
3207  if (iStep) {
3208  /*--- Odd ranks send and then receive, and vice versa. ---*/
3209  if (rank%2) SU2_MPI::Send(sendBuf.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dst, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3210  else SU2_MPI::Recv(donorVars.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, src, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3211 
3212  if (rank%2==0) SU2_MPI::Send(sendBuf.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, dst, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3213  else SU2_MPI::Recv(donorVars.data(), count, MPI_DOUBLE, src, 0, SU2_MPI::GetComm(), MPI_STATUS_IGNORE);
3214  }
3215 
3216  /*--- Find the closest target for each donor. ---*/
3217 
3218  vector<su2double> targetDist(donorVars.rows());
3219  vector<unsigned long> iTarget(donorVars.rows());
3220 
3221  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL_(for schedule(dynamic,4*OMP_MIN_SIZE))
3222  for (auto iDonor = 0ul; iDonor < donorVars.rows(); ++iDonor) {
3223  int r=0;
3224  adt.DetermineNearestNode(donorVars[iDonor], targetDist[iDonor], iTarget[iDonor], r);
3225  }
3226  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3227 
3228  /*--- Keep the closest donor for each target (this is separate for OpenMP). ---*/
3229 
3230  for (auto iDonor = 0ul; iDonor < donorVars.rows(); ++iDonor) {
3231  const auto iPoint = iTarget[iDonor];
3232  const auto dist = targetDist[iDonor];
3233 
3234  if (dist < donorDist[iPoint]) {
3235  donorDist[iPoint] = dist;
3236  isMapped[iPoint] = true;
3237  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < donorVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3238  localVars(iPoint,iVar) = donorVars(iDonor,iVar);
3239  }
3240  }
3241  }
3242  } // everything goes out of scope except "localVars" and "isMapped"
3243 
3244  /*--- Recursively diffuse the nearest neighbor data. ---*/
3245 
3246  auto nDonor = isMapped;
3247  bool done = false;
3248 
3249  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3250  while (!done) {
3251  SU2_OMP_FOR_DYN(roundUpDiv(nPointDomain,2*omp_get_num_threads()))
3252  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; ++iPoint) {
3253  /*--- Do not change points that are already interpolated. ---*/
3254  if (isMapped[iPoint]) continue;
3255 
3256  /*--- Boundaries to boundaries and domain to domain. ---*/
3257  const bool boundary_i = geometry->nodes->GetSolidBoundary(iPoint);
3258 
3259  for (const auto jPoint : geometry->nodes->GetPoints(iPoint)) {
3260  if (!isMapped[jPoint]) continue;
3261  if (boundary_i != geometry->nodes->GetSolidBoundary(jPoint)) continue;
3262 
3263  nDonor[iPoint]++;
3264 
3265  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < localVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3266  localVars(iPoint,iVar) += localVars(jPoint,iVar);
3267  }
3268 
3269  if (nDonor[iPoint] > 0) {
3270  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < localVars.cols(); ++iVar)
3271  localVars(iPoint,iVar) /= nDonor[iPoint];
3272  nDonor[iPoint] = true;
3273  }
3274  }
3275  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
3276 
3277  /*--- Repeat while all points are not mapped. ---*/
3278 
3279  SU2_OMP_MASTER {
3280  done = true;
3281  ++nRecurse;
3282  }
3283  END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
3284 
3285  bool myDone = true;
3286 
3287  SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(16*OMP_MIN_SIZE)
3288  for (auto iPoint = 0ul; iPoint < nPointDomain; ++iPoint) {
3289  isMapped[iPoint] = nDonor[iPoint];
3290  myDone &= nDonor[iPoint];
3291  }
3292  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
3293 
3294  SU2_OMP_ATOMIC
3295  done &= myDone;
3296 
3297  SU2_OMP_BARRIER
3298  }
3299  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
3300 
3301  } // everything goes out of scope except "localVars"
3302 
3303  /*--- Move to Restart_Data in ascending order of global index, which is how a matching restart would have been read. ---*/
3304 
3305  Restart_Data = new passivedouble[nPointDomain*nFields];
3306  Restart_Vars[2] = nPointDomain;
3307 
3308  int counter = 0;
3309  for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); ++iPoint_Global) {
3310  const auto iPoint = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
3311  if (iPoint >= 0) {
3312  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nFields; ++iVar)
3313  Restart_Data[counter*nFields+iVar] = SU2_TYPE::GetValue(localVars(iPoint,iVar));
3314  counter++;
3315  }
3316  }
3317 
3318  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3319  cout << "Number of recursions: " << nRecurse << ".\n"
3320  "Elapsed time: " << SU2_MPI::Wtime()-t0 << "s.\n" << endl;
3321  }
3322 }
3323 
3324 void CSolver::Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool adjoint, string val_filename) const {
3325 
3326  su2double AoA_ = config->GetAoA();
3327  su2double AoS_ = config->GetAoS();
3328  su2double BCThrust_ = config->GetInitial_BCThrust();
3329  su2double dCD_dCL_ = config->GetdCD_dCL();
3330  su2double dCMx_dCL_ = config->GetdCMx_dCL();
3331  su2double dCMy_dCL_ = config->GetdCMy_dCL();
3332  su2double dCMz_dCL_ = config->GetdCMz_dCL();
3333  su2double SPPressureDrop_ = config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop();
3334  string::size_type position;
3335  unsigned long InnerIter_ = 0;
3336  ifstream restart_file;
3337 
3338  /*--- Carry on with ASCII metadata reading. ---*/
3339 
3340  restart_file.open(val_filename.data(), ios::in);
3341  if (restart_file.fail()) {
3342  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) {
3343  cout << " Warning: There is no restart file (" << val_filename.data() << ")."<< endl;
3344  cout << " Computation will continue without updating metadata parameters." << endl;
3345  }
3346  }
3347  else {
3348 
3349  string text_line;
3350 
3351  /*--- Space for extra info (if any) ---*/
3352 
3353  while (getline (restart_file, text_line)) {
3354 
3355  /*--- External iteration ---*/
3356 
3357  position = text_line.find ("ITER=",0);
3358  if (position != string::npos) {
3359  // TODO: 'ITER=' has 5 chars, not 9!
3360  text_line.erase (0,9); InnerIter_ = atoi(text_line.c_str());
3361  }
3362 
3363  /*--- Angle of attack ---*/
3364 
3365  position = text_line.find ("AOA=",0);
3366  if (position != string::npos) {
3367  text_line.erase (0,4); AoA_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3368  }
3369 
3370  /*--- Sideslip angle ---*/
3371 
3372  position = text_line.find ("SIDESLIP_ANGLE=",0);
3373  if (position != string::npos) {
3374  text_line.erase (0,15); AoS_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3375  }
3376 
3377  /*--- BCThrust angle ---*/
3378 
3379  position = text_line.find ("INITIAL_BCTHRUST=",0);
3380  if (position != string::npos) {
3381  text_line.erase (0,17); BCThrust_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3382  }
3383 
3384  /*--- dCD_dCL coefficient ---*/
3385 
3386  position = text_line.find ("DCD_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3387  if (position != string::npos) {
3388  text_line.erase (0,14); dCD_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3389  }
3390 
3391  /*--- dCMx_dCL coefficient ---*/
3392 
3393  position = text_line.find ("DCMX_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3394  if (position != string::npos) {
3395  text_line.erase (0,15); dCMx_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3396  }
3397 
3398  /*--- dCMy_dCL coefficient ---*/
3399 
3400  position = text_line.find ("DCMY_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3401  if (position != string::npos) {
3402  text_line.erase (0,15); dCMy_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3403  }
3404 
3405  /*--- dCMz_dCL coefficient ---*/
3406 
3407  position = text_line.find ("DCMZ_DCL_VALUE=",0);
3408  if (position != string::npos) {
3409  text_line.erase (0,15); dCMz_dCL_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3410  }
3411 
3412  /*--- Streamwise periodic pressure drop for prescribed massflow cases. ---*/
3413 
3414  position = text_line.find ("STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP=",0);
3415  if (position != string::npos) {
3416  // Erase the name from the line, 'STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP=' has 34 chars.
3417  text_line.erase (0,34); SPPressureDrop_ = atof(text_line.c_str());
3418  }
3419 
3420  }
3421 
3422  /*--- Close the restart meta file. ---*/
3423 
3424  restart_file.close();
3425 
3426  }
3427 
3428 
3429  /*--- Load the metadata. ---*/
3430 
3431  /*--- Angle of attack ---*/
3432 
3433  if (config->GetDiscard_InFiles() == false) {
3434  if ((config->GetAoA() != AoA_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3435  cout.precision(6);
3436  cout <<"WARNING: AoA in the solution file (" << AoA_ << " deg.) +" << endl;
3437  cout << " AoA offset in mesh file (" << config->GetAoA_Offset() << " deg.) = " << AoA_ + config->GetAoA_Offset() << " deg." << endl;
3438  }
3439  config->SetAoA(AoA_ + config->GetAoA_Offset());
3440  }
3441 
3442  else {
3443  if ((config->GetAoA() != AoA_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3444  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the AoA in the solution file." << endl;
3445  }
3446 
3447  /*--- Sideslip angle ---*/
3448 
3449  if (config->GetDiscard_InFiles() == false) {
3450  if ((config->GetAoS() != AoS_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE)) {
3451  cout.precision(6);
3452  cout <<"WARNING: AoS in the solution file (" << AoS_ << " deg.) +" << endl;
3453  cout << " AoS offset in mesh file (" << config->GetAoS_Offset() << " deg.) = " << AoS_ + config->GetAoS_Offset() << " deg." << endl;
3454  }
3455  config->SetAoS(AoS_ + config->GetAoS_Offset());
3456  }
3457  else {
3458  if ((config->GetAoS() != AoS_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3459  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the AoS in the solution file." << endl;
3460  }
3461 
3462  /*--- BCThrust ---*/
3463 
3464  if (config->GetDiscard_InFiles() == false) {
3465  if ((config->GetInitial_BCThrust() != BCThrust_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3466  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the initial BC Thrust provided in the solution file: " << BCThrust_ << " lbs." << endl;
3467  config->SetInitial_BCThrust(BCThrust_);
3468  }
3469  else {
3470  if ((config->GetInitial_BCThrust() != BCThrust_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3471  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the BC Thrust in the solution file." << endl;
3472  }
3473 
3474 
3475  if (config->GetDiscard_InFiles() == false) {
3476 
3477  if ((config->GetdCD_dCL() != dCD_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3478  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCD/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCD_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3479  config->SetdCD_dCL(dCD_dCL_);
3480 
3481  if ((config->GetdCMx_dCL() != dCMx_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3482  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMx/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMx_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3483  config->SetdCMx_dCL(dCMx_dCL_);
3484 
3485  if ((config->GetdCMy_dCL() != dCMy_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3486  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMy/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMy_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3487  config->SetdCMy_dCL(dCMy_dCL_);
3488 
3489  if ((config->GetdCMz_dCL() != dCMz_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3490  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the dCMz/dCL provided in the direct solution file: " << dCMz_dCL_ << "." << endl;
3491  config->SetdCMz_dCL(dCMz_dCL_);
3492 
3493  }
3494 
3495  else {
3496 
3497  if ((config->GetdCD_dCL() != dCD_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3498  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCD/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3499 
3500  if ((config->GetdCMx_dCL() != dCMx_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3501  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMx/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3502 
3503  if ((config->GetdCMy_dCL() != dCMy_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3504  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMy/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3505 
3506  if ((config->GetdCMz_dCL() != dCMz_dCL_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3507  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the dCMz/dCL in the direct solution file." << endl;
3508 
3509  }
3510 
3511  if (config->GetDiscard_InFiles() == false) {
3512  if ((config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop() != SPPressureDrop_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3513  cout <<"WARNING: SU2 will use the STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP provided in the direct solution file: " << std::setprecision(16) << SPPressureDrop_ << endl;
3514  config->SetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop(SPPressureDrop_);
3515  }
3516  else {
3517  if ((config->GetStreamwise_Periodic_PressureDrop() != SPPressureDrop_) && (rank == MASTER_NODE))
3518  cout <<"WARNING: Discarding the STREAMWISE_PERIODIC_PRESSURE_DROP in the direct solution file." << endl;
3519  }
3520 
3521  /*--- External iteration ---*/
3522 
3523  if ((config->GetDiscard_InFiles() == false) && (!adjoint || (adjoint && config->GetRestart())))
3524  config->SetExtIter_OffSet(InnerIter_);
3525 
3526 }
3527 
3528 void CSolver::LoadInletProfile(CGeometry **geometry,
3529  CSolver ***solver,
3530  CConfig *config,
3531  int val_iter,
3532  unsigned short val_kind_solver,
3533  unsigned short val_kind_marker) const {
3534 
3535  /*-- First, set the solver and marker kind for the particular problem at
3536  hand. Note that, in the future, these routines can be used for any solver
3537  and potentially any marker type (beyond inlets). ---*/
3538 
3539  const auto KIND_SOLVER = val_kind_solver;
3540  const auto KIND_MARKER = val_kind_marker;
3541 
3542  const bool time_stepping = (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_1ST) ||
3543  (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::DT_STEPPING_2ND) ||
3544  (config->GetTime_Marching() == TIME_MARCHING::TIME_STEPPING);
3545 
3546  const auto iZone = config->GetiZone();
3547  const auto nZone = config->GetnZone();
3548 
3549  auto profile_filename = config->GetInlet_FileName();
3550 
3551  const auto turbulence = config->GetKind_Turb_Model() != TURB_MODEL::NONE;
3552  const unsigned short nVar_Turb = turbulence ? solver[MESH_0][TURB_SOL]->GetnVar() : 0;
3553 
3554  const auto species = config->GetKind_Species_Model() != SPECIES_MODEL::NONE;
3555  const unsigned short nVar_Species = species ? solver[MESH_0][SPECIES_SOL]->GetnVar() : 0;
3556 
3557  /*--- names of the columns in the profile ---*/
3558  vector<string> columnNames;
3559  vector<string> columnValues;
3560 
3561  /*--- Count the number of columns that we have for this flow case,
3562  excluding the coordinates. Here, we have 2 entries for the total
3563  conditions or mass flow, another nDim for the direction vector, and
3564  finally entries for the number of turbulence variables. This is only
3565  necessary in case we are writing a template profile file or for Inlet
3566  Interpolation purposes. ---*/
3567 
3568  const unsigned short nCol_InletFile = 2 + nDim + nVar_Turb + nVar_Species;
3569 
3570  /*--- for incompressible flow, we can switch the energy equation off ---*/
3571  /*--- for now, we write the temperature even if we are not using it ---*/
3572  /*--- because a number of routines depend on the presence of the temperature field ---*/
3573  //if (config->GetEnergy_Equation() ==false)
3574  //nCol_InletFile = nCol_InletFile -1;
3575 
3576  /*--- Multizone problems require the number of the zone to be appended. ---*/
3577 
3578  if (nZone > 1)
3579  profile_filename = config->GetMultizone_FileName(profile_filename, iZone, ".dat");
3580 
3581  /*--- Modify file name for an unsteady restart ---*/
3582 
3583  if (time_stepping)
3584  profile_filename = config->GetUnsteady_FileName(profile_filename, val_iter, ".dat");
3585 
3586 
3587  // create vector of column names
3588  for (unsigned short iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3589 
3590  /*--- Skip if this is the wrong type of marker. ---*/
3591  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != KIND_MARKER) continue;
3592 
3593  string Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3594  su2double p_total = config->GetInlet_Ptotal(Marker_Tag);
3595  su2double t_total = config->GetInlet_Ttotal(Marker_Tag);
3596  auto flow_dir = config->GetInlet_FlowDir(Marker_Tag);
3597  std::stringstream columnName,columnValue;
3598 
3599  columnValue << setprecision(15);
3600  columnValue << std::scientific;
3601 
3602  columnValue << t_total << "\t" << p_total <<"\t";
3603  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3604  columnValue << flow_dir[iDim] <<"\t";
3605  }
3606 
3607  columnName << "# COORD-X " << setw(24) << "COORD-Y " << setw(24);
3608  if(nDim==3) columnName << "COORD-Z " << setw(24);
3609 
3610  if (config->GetKind_Regime()==ENUM_REGIME::COMPRESSIBLE){
3611  switch (config->GetKind_Inlet()) {
3612  /*--- compressible conditions ---*/
3613  case INLET_TYPE::TOTAL_CONDITIONS:
3614  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3615  break;
3616  case INLET_TYPE::MASS_FLOW:
3617  columnName << "DENSITY " << setw(24) << "VELOCITY " << setw(24);
3618  break;
3619  default:
3620  SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported INLET_TYPE.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3621  break; }
3622  } else {
3623  switch (config->GetKind_Inc_Inlet(Marker_Tag)) {
3624  /*--- incompressible conditions ---*/
3625  case INLET_TYPE::VELOCITY_INLET:
3626  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "VELOCITY " << setw(24);
3627  break;
3628  case INLET_TYPE::PRESSURE_INLET:
3629  columnName << "TEMPERATURE" << setw(24) << "PRESSURE " << setw(24);
3630  break;
3631  default:
3632  SU2_MPI::Error("Unsupported INC_INLET_TYPE.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3633  break;
3634  }
3635  }
3636 
3637  columnName << "NORMAL-X " << setw(24) << "NORMAL-Y " << setw(24);
3638  if(nDim==3) columnName << "NORMAL-Z " << setw(24);
3639 
3640  switch (TurbModelFamily(config->GetKind_Turb_Model())) {
3641  case TURB_FAMILY::NONE: break;
3642  case TURB_FAMILY::SA:
3643  /*--- 1-equation turbulence model: SA ---*/
3644  columnName << "NU_TILDE " << setw(24);
3645  columnValue << config->GetNuFactor_FreeStream() * config->GetViscosity_FreeStream() / config->GetDensity_FreeStream() <<"\t";
3646  break;
3647  case TURB_FAMILY::KW:
3648  /*--- 2-equation turbulence model (SST) ---*/
3649  columnName << "TKE " << setw(24) << "DISSIPATION" << setw(24);
3650  columnValue << config->GetTke_FreeStream() << "\t" << config->GetOmega_FreeStream() <<"\t";
3651  break;
3652  }
3653 
3654  switch (config->GetKind_Species_Model()) {
3655  case SPECIES_MODEL::NONE: break;
3656  case SPECIES_MODEL::SPECIES_TRANSPORT:
3657  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar_Species; iVar++) {
3658  columnName << "SPECIES_" + std::to_string(iVar) + " " << setw(24);
3659  columnValue << config->GetInlet_SpeciesVal(Marker_Tag)[iVar] << "\t";
3660  }
3661  break;
3662  }
3663 
3664  columnNames.push_back(columnName.str());
3665  columnValues.push_back(columnValue.str());
3666 
3667  }
3668 
3669 
3670  /*--- Read the profile data from an ASCII file. ---*/
3671 
3672  CMarkerProfileReaderFVM profileReader(geometry[MESH_0], config, profile_filename, KIND_MARKER, nCol_InletFile, columnNames,columnValues);
3673 
3674  /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
3675 
3676  unsigned long Marker_Counter = 0;
3677  unsigned short local_failure = 0;
3678 
3679  const su2double tolerance = config->GetInlet_Profile_Matching_Tolerance();
3680 
3681  for (auto iMarker = 0ul; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3682 
3683  /*--- Skip if this is the wrong type of marker. ---*/
3684 
3685  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) != KIND_MARKER) continue;
3686 
3687  /*--- Get tag in order to identify the correct inlet data. ---*/
3688 
3689  const auto Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3690 
3691  for (auto jMarker = 0ul; jMarker < profileReader.GetNumberOfProfiles(); jMarker++) {
3692 
3693  /*--- If we have not found the matching marker string, continue to next marker. ---*/
3694 
3695  if (profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker) != Marker_Tag) continue;
3696 
3697  /*--- Increment our counter for marker matches. ---*/
3698 
3699  Marker_Counter++;
3700 
3701  /*--- Get data for this profile. ---*/
3702 
3703  const vector<passivedouble>& Inlet_Data = profileReader.GetDataForProfile(jMarker);
3704  const auto nColumns = profileReader.GetNumberOfColumnsInProfile(jMarker);
3705  vector<su2double> Inlet_Data_Interpolated ((nCol_InletFile+nDim)*geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker]);
3706 
3707  /*--- Define Inlet Values vectors before and after interpolation (if needed) ---*/
3708  vector<su2double> Inlet_Values(nCol_InletFile+nDim);
3709  vector<su2double> Inlet_Interpolated(nColumns);
3710 
3711  const auto nRows = profileReader.GetNumberOfRowsInProfile(jMarker);
3712 
3713  /*--- Pointer to call Set and Evaluate functions. ---*/
3714  vector<C1DInterpolation*> interpolator(nColumns,nullptr);
3715  string interpolation_function, interpolation_type;
3716 
3717  /*--- Define the reference for interpolation. ---*/
3718  unsigned short radius_index=0;
3719  vector<su2double> InletRadii = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, radius_index);
3720  vector<su2double> Interpolation_Column (nRows);
3721 
3722  bool Interpolate = true;
3723 
3724  switch(config->GetKindInletInterpolationFunction()){
3725 
3726  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::NONE):
3727  Interpolate = false;
3728  break;
3729 
3730  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::AKIMA_1D):
3731  for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3732  Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3733  interpolator[iCol] = new CAkimaInterpolation(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3734  }
3735  interpolation_function = "AKIMA";
3736  break;
3737 
3738  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::LINEAR_1D):
3739  for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3740  Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3741  interpolator[iCol] = new CLinearInterpolation(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3742  }
3743  interpolation_function = "LINEAR";
3744  break;
3745 
3746  case (INLET_SPANWISE_INTERP::CUBIC_1D):
3747  for (auto iCol=0ul; iCol < nColumns; iCol++){
3748  Interpolation_Column = profileReader.GetColumnForProfile(jMarker, iCol);
3749  interpolator[iCol] = new CCubicSpline(InletRadii,Interpolation_Column);
3750  }
3751  interpolation_function = "CUBIC";
3752  break;
3753 
3754  default:
3755  SU2_MPI::Error("Unknown type of interpolation function for inlets.\n",CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3756  break;
3757  }
3758 
3759  if (Interpolate){
3760  switch(config->GetKindInletInterpolationType()){
3761  case(INLET_INTERP_TYPE::VR_VTHETA):
3762  interpolation_type="VR_VTHETA";
3763  break;
3764  case(INLET_INTERP_TYPE::ALPHA_PHI):
3765  interpolation_type="ALPHA_PHI";
3766  break;
3767  }
3768  cout<<"Inlet Interpolation being done using "<<interpolation_function
3769  <<" function and type "<<interpolation_type<<" for "<< Marker_Tag<<endl;
3770  if(nDim == 3)
3771  cout<<"Ensure the flow direction is in z direction"<<endl;
3772  else if (nDim == 2)
3773  cout<<"Ensure the flow direction is in x direction"<<endl;
3774  }
3775  else {
3776  cout<<"No Inlet Interpolation being used"<<endl;
3777  }
3778 
3779  /*--- Loop through the nodes on this marker. ---*/
3780 
3781  for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3782 
3783  const auto iPoint = geometry[MESH_0]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3784  const auto Coord = geometry[MESH_0]->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
3785 
3786  if (!Interpolate) {
3787 
3788  su2double min_dist = 1e16;
3789 
3790  /*--- Find the distance to the closest point in our inlet profile data. ---*/
3791 
3792  for (auto iRow = 0ul; iRow < nRows; iRow++) {
3793 
3794  /*--- Get the coords for this data point. ---*/
3795 
3796  const auto index = iRow*nColumns;
3797 
3798  const auto dist = GeometryToolbox::Distance(nDim, Coord, &Inlet_Data[index]);
3799 
3800  /*--- Check is this is the closest point and store data if so. ---*/
3801 
3802  if (dist < min_dist) {
3803  min_dist = dist;
3804  for (auto iVar = 0ul; iVar < nColumns; iVar++)
3805  Inlet_Values[iVar] = Inlet_Data[index+iVar];
3806  }
3807 
3808  }
3809 
3810  /*--- If the diff is less than the tolerance, match the two.
3811  We could modify this to simply use the nearest neighbor, or
3812  eventually add something more elaborate here for interpolation. ---*/
3813 
3814  if (min_dist < tolerance) {
3815 
3816  solver[MESH_0][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3817 
3818  } else {
3819 
3820  unsigned long GlobalIndex = geometry[MESH_0]->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
3821  cout << "WARNING: Did not find a match between the points in the inlet file\n";
3822  cout << "and point " << GlobalIndex;
3823  cout << std::scientific;
3824  cout << " at location: [" << Coord[0] << ", " << Coord[1];
3825  if (nDim==3) cout << ", " << Coord[2];
3826  cout << "]\n";
3827  cout << "Distance to closest point: " << min_dist << "\n";
3828  cout << "Current tolerance: " << tolerance << "\n\n";
3829  cout << "You can increase the tolerance for point matching by changing the value\n";
3830  cout << "of the option INLET_MATCHING_TOLERANCE in your *.cfg file." << endl;
3831  local_failure++;
3832  break;
3833  }
3834 
3835  }
3836  else { // Interpolate
3837 
3838  /* --- Calculating the radius and angle of the vertex ---*/
3839  /* --- Flow should be in z direction for 3D cases ---*/
3840  /* --- Or in x direction for 2D cases ---*/
3841  const su2double Interp_Radius = sqrt(pow(Coord[0],2)+ pow(Coord[1],2));
3842  const su2double Theta = atan2(Coord[1],Coord[0]);
3843 
3844  /* --- Evaluating and saving the final spline data ---*/
3845  for (auto iVar=0ul; iVar < nColumns; iVar++){
3846 
3847  /*---Evaluate spline will get the respective value of the Data set (column) specified
3848  for that interpolator[iVar], cycling through all columns to get all the
3849  data for that vertex ---*/
3850  Inlet_Interpolated[iVar]=interpolator[iVar]->EvaluateSpline(Interp_Radius);
3851  if (Interp_Radius < InletRadii.front() || Interp_Radius > InletRadii.back()) {
3852  cout << "WARNING: Did not find a match between the radius in the inlet file " ;
3853  cout << std::scientific;
3854  cout << "at location: [" << Coord[0] << ", " << Coord[1];
3855  if (nDim == 3) {cout << ", " << Coord[2];}
3856  cout << "]";
3857  cout << " with Radius: "<< Interp_Radius << endl;
3858  cout << "You can add a row for Radius: " << Interp_Radius <<" in the inlet file ";
3859  cout << "to eliminate this issue or give proper data" << endl;
3860  local_failure++;
3861  break;
3862  }
3863  }
3864 
3865  /*--- Correcting for Interpolation Type ---*/
3866 
3867  Inlet_Values = CorrectedInletValues(Inlet_Interpolated, Theta, nDim, Coord,
3868  nVar_Turb, config->GetKindInletInterpolationType());
3869 
3870  solver[MESH_0][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3871 
3872  for (unsigned short iVar=0; iVar < (nCol_InletFile+nDim); iVar++)
3873  Inlet_Data_Interpolated[iVertex*(nCol_InletFile+nDim)+iVar] = Inlet_Values[iVar];
3874 
3875  }
3876 
3877  } // end iVertex loop
3878 
3879  if (config->GetPrintInlet_InterpolatedData()) {
3880  PrintInletInterpolatedData(Inlet_Data_Interpolated, profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker),
3881  geometry[MESH_0]->nVertex[iMarker], nDim, nCol_InletFile+nDim);
3882  }
3883 
3884  for (auto& interp : interpolator) delete interp;
3885 
3886  } // end jMarker loop
3887 
3888  if (local_failure > 0) break;
3889 
3890  } // end iMarker loop
3891 
3892  unsigned short global_failure;
3893  SU2_MPI::Allreduce(&local_failure, &global_failure, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_SHORT, MPI_SUM, SU2_MPI::GetComm());
3894 
3895  if (global_failure > 0) {
3896  SU2_MPI::Error("Prescribed inlet data does not match markers within tolerance.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
3897  }
3898 
3899  /*--- Copy the inlet data down to the coarse levels if multigrid is active.
3900  Here, we use a face area-averaging to restrict the values. ---*/
3901 
3902  for (auto iMesh = 1u; iMesh <= config->GetnMGLevels(); iMesh++) {
3903  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3904  if (config->GetMarker_All_KindBC(iMarker) == KIND_MARKER) {
3905 
3906  const auto Marker_Tag = config->GetMarker_All_TagBound(iMarker);
3907 
3908  /* Check the number of columns and allocate temp array. */
3909 
3910  unsigned short nColumns = 0;
3911  for (auto jMarker = 0ul; jMarker < profileReader.GetNumberOfProfiles(); jMarker++) {
3912  if (profileReader.GetTagForProfile(jMarker) == Marker_Tag) {
3913  nColumns = profileReader.GetNumberOfColumnsInProfile(jMarker);
3914  break;
3915  }
3916  }
3917  vector<su2double> Inlet_Values(nColumns);
3918  vector<su2double> Inlet_Fine(nColumns);
3919 
3920  /*--- Loop through the nodes on this marker. ---*/
3921 
3922  for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry[iMesh]->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3923 
3924  /*--- Get the coarse mesh point and compute the boundary area. ---*/
3925 
3926  const auto iPoint = geometry[iMesh]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3927  const auto Normal = geometry[iMesh]->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3928  const su2double Area_Parent = GeometryToolbox::Norm(nDim, Normal);
3929 
3930  /*--- Reset the values for the coarse point. ---*/
3931 
3932  for (auto& v : Inlet_Values) v = 0.0;
3933 
3934  /*-- Loop through the children and extract the inlet values
3935  from those nodes that lie on the boundary as well as their
3936  boundary area. We build a face area-averaged value for the
3937  coarse point values from the fine grid points. Note that
3938  children from the interior volume will not be included in
3939  the averaging. ---*/
3940 
3941  for (auto iChildren = 0u; iChildren < geometry[iMesh]->nodes->GetnChildren_CV(iPoint); iChildren++) {
3942  const auto Point_Fine = geometry[iMesh]->nodes->GetChildren_CV(iPoint, iChildren);
3943 
3944  auto Area_Children = solver[iMesh-1][KIND_SOLVER]->GetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Fine.data(), Point_Fine, KIND_MARKER,
3945  Marker_Tag, geometry[iMesh-1], config);
3946  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nColumns; iVar++)
3947  Inlet_Values[iVar] += Inlet_Fine[iVar]*Area_Children/Area_Parent;
3948  }
3949 
3950  /*--- Set the boundary area-averaged inlet values for the coarse point. ---*/
3951 
3952  solver[iMesh][KIND_SOLVER]->SetInletAtVertex(Inlet_Values.data(), iMarker, iVertex);
3953 
3954  }
3955  }
3956  }
3957  }
3958 
3959 }

3962 void CSolver::ComputeVertexTractions(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
3963 
3964  const bool viscous_flow = config->GetViscous();
3965  const su2double Pressure_Inf = config->GetPressure_FreeStreamND();
3966 
3967  for (auto iMarker = 0u; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
3968 
3969  /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
3970  if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
3971 
3972  // Loop over the vertices
3973  for (auto iVertex = 0ul; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
3974 
3975  // Recover the point index
3976  const auto iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
3977 
3978  su2double auxForce[3] = {0.0};
3979 
3980  // Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node).
3981  if (geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) {
3982 
3983  // Get the normal at the vertex: this normal goes inside the fluid domain.
3984  const su2double* Normal = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNormal();
3985 
3986  // Retrieve the values of pressure
3987  const su2double Pn = base_nodes->GetPressure(iPoint);
3988 
3989  // Calculate tn in the fluid nodes for the inviscid term --> Units of force (non-dimensional).
3990  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++)
3991  auxForce[iDim] = -(Pn-Pressure_Inf)*Normal[iDim];
3992 
3993  // Calculate tn in the fluid nodes for the viscous term
3994  if (viscous_flow) {
3995  const su2double Viscosity = base_nodes->GetLaminarViscosity(iPoint);
3996  su2double Tau[3][3];
3997  CNumerics::ComputeStressTensor(nDim, Tau, base_nodes->GetVelocityGradient(iPoint), Viscosity);
3998  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
3999  auxForce[iDim] += GeometryToolbox::DotProduct(nDim, Tau[iDim], Normal);
4000  }
4001  }
4002  }
4003 
4004  // Redimensionalize the forces (Lref is 1, thus only Pref is needed).
4005  for (unsigned short iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4006  VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim] = config->GetPressure_Ref() * auxForce[iDim];
4007  }
4008  }
4009  }
4010 
4011 }

4013 void CSolver::RegisterVertexTractions(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4014 
4015  unsigned short iMarker, iDim;
4016  unsigned long iVertex, iPoint;
4017 
4018  /*--- Loop over all the markers ---*/
4019  for (iMarker = 0; iMarker < config->GetnMarker_All(); iMarker++) {
4020 
4021  /*--- If this is defined as a wall ---*/
4022  if (!config->GetSolid_Wall(iMarker)) continue;
4023 
4024  /*--- Loop over the vertices ---*/
4025  SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(OMP_MIN_SIZE)
4026  for (iVertex = 0; iVertex < geometry->nVertex[iMarker]; iVertex++) {
4027 
4028  /*--- Recover the point index ---*/
4029  iPoint = geometry->vertex[iMarker][iVertex]->GetNode();
4030 
4031  /*--- Check if the node belongs to the domain (i.e, not a halo node) ---*/
4032  if (!geometry->nodes->GetDomain(iPoint)) continue;
4033 
4034  /*--- Register the vertex traction as output ---*/
4035  for (iDim = 0; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4036  AD::RegisterOutput(VertexTraction[iMarker][iVertex][iDim]);
4037  }
4038  }
4039  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4040  }
4041 
4042 }

4077 void CSolver::SetVerificationSolution(unsigned short nDim,
4078  unsigned short nVar,
4079  CConfig *config) {
4080 
4081  /*--- Determine the verification solution to be set and
4082  allocate memory for the corresponding class. ---*/
4083  switch( config->GetVerification_Solution() ) {
4084 
4085  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::NONE:
4086  VerificationSolution = nullptr; break;
4087  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::INVISCID_VORTEX:
4088  VerificationSolution = new CInviscidVortexSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4089  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::RINGLEB:
4090  VerificationSolution = new CRinglebSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4091  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::NS_UNIT_QUAD:
4092  VerificationSolution = new CNSUnitQuadSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4093  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::TAYLOR_GREEN_VORTEX:
4094  VerificationSolution = new CTGVSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4095  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::INC_TAYLOR_GREEN_VORTEX:
4096  VerificationSolution = new CIncTGVSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4097  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_UNIT_QUAD:
4098  VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSUnitQuadSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4099  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_UNIT_QUAD_WALL_BC:
4100  VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSUnitQuadSolutionWallBC(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4101  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_TWO_HALF_CIRCLES:
4102  VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSTwoHalfCirclesSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4103  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_NS_TWO_HALF_SPHERES:
4104  VerificationSolution = new CMMSNSTwoHalfSpheresSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4105  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_INC_EULER:
4106  VerificationSolution = new CMMSIncEulerSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4107  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::MMS_INC_NS:
4108  VerificationSolution = new CMMSIncNSSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4109  case VERIFICATION_SOLUTION::USER_DEFINED_SOLUTION:
4110  VerificationSolution = new CUserDefinedSolution(nDim, nVar, MGLevel, config); break;
4111  }

4114 void CSolver::ComputeResidual_Multizone(const CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config){
4115 
4116  SU2_OMP_PARALLEL {
4117 
4118  /*--- Set Residuals to zero ---*/
4119  SU2_OMP_MASTER
4120  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++){
4121  Residual_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
4122  Residual_Max_BGS[iVar] = 0.0;
4123  }
4124  END_SU2_OMP_MASTER
4125 
4126  vector<su2double> resMax(nVar,0.0), resRMS(nVar,0.0);
4127  vector<const su2double*> coordMax(nVar,nullptr);
4128  vector<unsigned long> idxMax(nVar,0);
4129 
4130  /*--- Set the residuals and BGSSolution_k to solution for next multizone outer iteration. ---*/
4131  SU2_OMP_FOR_STAT(roundUpDiv(nPoint,2*omp_get_num_threads()))
4132  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPoint; iPoint++) {
4133  const su2double domain = (iPoint < nPointDomain);
4134  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4135  const su2double Res = (base_nodes->Get_BGSSolution(iPoint,iVar) - base_nodes->Get_BGSSolution_k(iPoint,iVar))*domain;
4136 
4137  /*--- Update residual information for current thread. ---*/
4138  resRMS[iVar] += Res*Res;
4139  if (fabs(Res) > resMax[iVar]) {
4140  resMax[iVar] = fabs(Res);
4141  idxMax[iVar] = iPoint;
4142  coordMax[iVar] = geometry->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4143  }
4144  }
4145  }
4146  END_SU2_OMP_FOR
4147 
4148  /*--- Reduce residual information over all threads in this rank. ---*/
4149  SU2_OMP_CRITICAL
4150  for (unsigned short iVar = 0; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4151  Residual_BGS[iVar] += resRMS[iVar];
4152  AddRes_Max_BGS(iVar, resMax[iVar], geometry->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(idxMax[iVar]), coordMax[iVar]);
4153  }
4154  END_SU2_OMP_CRITICAL
4155  SU2_OMP_BARRIER
4156 
4157  SetResidual_BGS(geometry, config);
4158 
4159  }
4160  END_SU2_OMP_PARALLEL
4161 }

4163 void CSolver::BasicLoadRestart(CGeometry *geometry, const CConfig *config, const string& filename, unsigned long skipVars) {
4164 
4165  /*--- Read and store the restart metadata. ---*/
4166 
4167 // Read_SU2_Restart_Metadata(geometry[MESH_0], config, true, filename);
4168 
4169  /*--- Read the restart data from either an ASCII or binary SU2 file. ---*/
4170 
4171  if (config->GetRead_Binary_Restart()) {
4172  Read_SU2_Restart_Binary(geometry, config, filename);
4173  } else {
4174  Read_SU2_Restart_ASCII(geometry, config, filename);
4175  }
4176 
4177  /*--- Load data from the restart into correct containers. ---*/
4178 
4179  unsigned long iPoint_Global_Local = 0;
4180 
4181  for (auto iPoint_Global = 0ul; iPoint_Global < geometry->GetGlobal_nPointDomain(); iPoint_Global++ ) {
4182 
4183  /*--- Retrieve local index. If this node from the restart file lives
4184  on the current processor, we will load and instantiate the vars. ---*/
4185 
4186  const auto iPoint_Local = geometry->GetGlobal_to_Local_Point(iPoint_Global);
4187 
4188  if (iPoint_Local > -1) {
4189 
4190  /*--- We need to store this point's data, so jump to the correct
4191  offset in the buffer of data from the restart file and load it. ---*/
4192 
4193  const auto index = iPoint_Global_Local*Restart_Vars[1] + skipVars;
4194 
4195  for (auto iVar = 0u; iVar < nVar; iVar++) {
4196  base_nodes->SetSolution(iPoint_Local, iVar, Restart_Data[index+iVar]);
4197  }
4198 
4199  iPoint_Global_Local++;
4200  }
4201 
4202  }
4203 
4204  /*--- Delete the class memory that is used to load the restart. ---*/
4205 
4206  delete [] Restart_Vars; Restart_Vars = nullptr;
4207  delete [] Restart_Data; Restart_Data = nullptr;
4208 
4209  /*--- Detect a wrong solution file ---*/
4210 
4211  if (iPoint_Global_Local != nPointDomain) {
4212  SU2_MPI::Error(string("The solution file ") + filename + string(" doesn't match with the mesh file!\n") +
4213  string("It could be empty lines at the end of the file."), CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4214  }
4215 }

4217 void CSolver::SavelibROM(CGeometry *geometry, CConfig *config, bool converged) {
4218 
4219 #if defined(HAVE_LIBROM) && !defined(CODI_FORWARD_TYPE) && !defined(CODI_REVERSE_TYPE)
4220  const bool unsteady = config->GetTime_Domain();
4221  const string filename = config->GetlibROMbase_FileName();
4222  const unsigned long TimeIter = config->GetTimeIter();
4223  const unsigned long nTimeIter = config->GetnTime_Iter();
4224  const int maxBasisDim = config->GetMax_BasisDim();
4225  const int save_freq = config->GetRom_SaveFreq();
4226  int dim = int(nPointDomain * nVar);
4227  bool incremental = false;
4228 
4229  if (!u_basis_generator) {
4230 
4231  /*--- Define SVD basis generator ---*/
4232  auto timesteps = static_cast<int>(nTimeIter - TimeIter);
4233  CAROM::Options svd_options = CAROM::Options(dim, timesteps, -1,
4234  false, true).setMaxBasisDimension(int(maxBasisDim));
4235 
4236  if (config->GetKind_PODBasis() == POD_KIND::STATIC) {
4237  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Creating static basis generator." << std::endl;
4238 
4239  if (unsteady) {
4240  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Incremental basis generator recommended for unsteady simulations." << std::endl;
4241  }
4242  }
4243  else {
4244  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Creating incremental basis generator." << std::endl;
4245 
4246  svd_options.setIncrementalSVD(1.0e-3, config->GetDelta_UnstTime(),
4247  1.0e-2, config->GetDelta_UnstTime()*nTimeIter, true).setDebugMode(false);
4248  incremental = true;
4249  }
4250 
4251  u_basis_generator.reset(new CAROM::BasisGenerator(
4252  svd_options, incremental,
4253  filename));
4254 
4255  // Save mesh ordering
4256  std::ofstream f;
4257  f.open(filename + "_mesh_" + to_string(rank) + ".csv");
4258  for (unsigned long iPoint = 0; iPoint < nPointDomain; iPoint++) {
4259  unsigned long globalPoint = geometry->nodes->GetGlobalIndex(iPoint);
4260  auto Coord = geometry->nodes->GetCoord(iPoint);
4261 
4262  for (unsigned long iDim; iDim < nDim; iDim++) {
4263  f << Coord[iDim] << ", ";
4264  }
4265  f << globalPoint << "\n";
4266  }
4267  f.close();
4268  }
4269 
4270  if (unsteady && (TimeIter % save_freq == 0)) {
4271  // give solution and time steps to libROM:
4272  su2double dt = config->GetDelta_UnstTime();
4273  su2double t = config->GetCurrent_UnstTime();
4274  u_basis_generator->takeSample(const_cast<su2double*>(base_nodes->GetSolution().data()), t, dt);
4275  }
4276 
4277  /*--- End collection of data and save POD ---*/
4278 
4279  if (converged) {
4280 
4281  if (!unsteady) {
4282  // dt is different for each node, so just use a placeholder dt
4283  su2double dt = base_nodes->GetDelta_Time(0);
4284  su2double t = dt*TimeIter;
4285  u_basis_generator->takeSample(const_cast<su2double*>(base_nodes->GetSolution().data()), t, dt);
4286  }
4287 
4288  if (config->GetKind_PODBasis() == POD_KIND::STATIC) {
4289  u_basis_generator->writeSnapshot();
4290  }
4291 
4292  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Computing SVD" << std::endl;
4293  int rom_dim = u_basis_generator->getSpatialBasis()->numColumns();
4294 
4295  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "Basis dimension: " << rom_dim << std::endl;
4296  u_basis_generator->endSamples();
4297 
4298  if (rank == MASTER_NODE) std::cout << "ROM Sampling ended" << std::endl;
4299  }
4300 
4301 #else
4302  SU2_MPI::Error("SU2 was not compiled with libROM support.", CURRENT_FUNCTION);
4303 #endif
4304 
4305 }
